quoteText: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless the WhatsApp Parties from and against all liabilities, damages, losses, and expenses of any kind (including reasonable legal fees and costs) relating to, arising out of, or in any way in connection with any of the following: (a) your access to or use of our Services, including information provided in connection therewith. (b) your breach or alleged breach of our Terms. or (c) any misrepresentation made by you.
title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
